trans-unit.source: Defines configuration settings that control the behavior of the application hosting environment.
trans-unit.target: 定義組態設定以控制應用程式裝載環境的行為。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HostingEnvironmentSection> class provides a way to programmatically access and modify the values of the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HostingEnvironmentSection> section in the configuration file.When an ASP.NET application is unused for a specified amount of time, it can be unloaded from memory based on the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HostingEnvironmentSection.IdleTimeout%2A> and <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HostingEnvironmentSection.ShutdownTimeout%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HostingEnvironmentSection>類別提供方法來以程式設計方式存取和修改的值<xref:System.Web.Configuration.HostingEnvironmentSection>組態檔中的區段。當 ASP.NET 應用程式未使用指定的時間量，它可以是從根據記憶體中卸載<xref:System.Web.Configuration.HostingEnvironmentSection.IdleTimeout%2A>和<xref:System.Web.Configuration.HostingEnvironmentSection.ShutdownTimeout%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: This example demonstrates how to specify values declaratively for several attributes of the [hostingEnvironment Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/043a75c8-231a-4f8d-9633-501530bd7d40) section, which can also be accessed as members of the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HostingEnvironmentSection> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例示範如何指定以宣告方式的數個屬性的值[hostingEnvironment 元素 （ASP.NET 設定結構描述）](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/043a75c8-231a-4f8d-9633-501530bd7d40)區段，也可以做為成員的存取<xref:System.Web.Configuration.HostingEnvironmentSection>類別。

trans-unit.source: The following configuration file example shows how to specify values declaratively for the [hostingEnvironment Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/043a75c8-231a-4f8d-9633-501530bd7d40) section.
trans-unit.target: 下列組態檔範例示範如何以宣告方式為指定值[hostingEnvironment 元素 （ASP.NET 設定結構描述）](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/043a75c8-231a-4f8d-9633-501530bd7d40) > 一節。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HostingEnvironmentSection> class.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.Configuration.HostingEnvironmentSection>類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Configuration.HostingEnvironmentSection" /> class by using default settings.
trans-unit.target: 使用預設值初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.Configuration.HostingEnvironmentSection" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HostingEnvironmentSection.%23ctor%2A> constructor is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HostingEnvironmentSection.%23ctor%2A>建構函式不適合直接從您的程式碼使用。

trans-unit.source: It is called by the ASP.NET configuration system.
trans-unit.target: 它會呼叫 ASP.NET 組態系統。

trans-unit.source: You obtain an instance of the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HostingEnvironmentSection> class by using the <xref:System.Configuration.Configuration.GetSection%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 取得執行個體<xref:System.Web.Configuration.HostingEnvironmentSection>類別使用<xref:System.Configuration.Configuration.GetSection%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the amount of time, in minutes, before unloading an inactive application.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定卸載非作用中應用程式之前的時間長度，以分鐘為單位。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> that is the specified number of minutes before unloading an inactive application.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> 是卸載非作用中應用程式之前的指定分鐘數。

trans-unit.source: The default value for the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HostingEnvironmentSection.IdleTimeout%2A> property is "Infinite".
trans-unit.target: 預設值為<xref:System.Web.Configuration.HostingEnvironmentSection.IdleTimeout%2A>屬性是 「 無限 」。

trans-unit.source: This setting can be set at the machine or application level.
trans-unit.target: 這個設定可以在電腦或應用程式層級設定。

trans-unit.source: If this setting is defined at any other level, it is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果這項設定會定義任何其他層級，則會忽略它。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to use the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HostingEnvironmentSection.IdleTimeout%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HostingEnvironmentSection.IdleTimeout%2A> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HostingEnvironmentSection> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Web.Configuration.HostingEnvironmentSection>類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the assemblies of an application in Bin are shadow copied to the application's ASP.NET Temporary Files directory.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值表示位於 Bin 的應用程式組件是否應陰影複製到應用程式的 ASP.NET Temporary Files 目錄中。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the assemblies of an application in Bin are shadow copied to the application's ASP.NET Temporary Files directory; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果位於 Bin 的應用程式組件陰影複製到應用程式的 ASP.NET Temporary Files 目錄，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the amount of time, in seconds, to gracefully shut down the application.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定適當關閉應用程式的時間長度，以秒為單位。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> that is the specified number of seconds to gracefully shut down the application.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> 是適當關閉應用程式的指定秒數。

trans-unit.source: The default is 30 seconds.
trans-unit.target: 預設為 30 秒。

trans-unit.source: The default value for the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HostingEnvironmentSection.ShutdownTimeout%2A> property is 30 seconds.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為<xref:System.Web.Configuration.HostingEnvironmentSection.ShutdownTimeout%2A>屬性為 30 秒。

trans-unit.source: This setting can be set at the machine or application level.
trans-unit.target: 這個設定可以在電腦或應用程式層級設定。

trans-unit.source: If this setting is defined at any other configuration level, it is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果這項設定會定義任何其他組態層級，則會忽略它。

trans-unit.source: If a debugger is attached to the application, the application will not be shut down.
trans-unit.target: 如果偵錯工具附加至應用程式中，應用程式將不會關閉。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to use the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HostingEnvironmentSection.ShutdownTimeout%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HostingEnvironmentSection.ShutdownTimeout%2A> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HostingEnvironmentSection> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Web.Configuration.HostingEnvironmentSection>類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that determines how ASP.NET caches URL metadata.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定判斷 ASP.NET 如何快取 URL 中繼資料的值。

trans-unit.source: A value that determines how ASP.NET caches URL metadata.
trans-unit.target: 判斷 ASP.NET 如何快取 URL 中繼資料的值。

trans-unit.source: The default value is 1 minute.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 1 分鐘。

trans-unit.source: An example of URL metadata is information in the Web.config file about security restrictions that apply to a particular URL.
trans-unit.target: URL 中繼資料的範例是 Web.config 檔案中有關安全性限制會套用至特定 URL 的資訊。

trans-unit.source: The following values have special meanings:
trans-unit.target: 下列的值有特殊意義：

trans-unit.source: "Infinite".
trans-unit.target: 「 無限 」。

trans-unit.source: URL metadata is cached without a sliding expiration.
trans-unit.target: URL 中繼資料會快取不會變動到期。

trans-unit.source: This means caching continues until the server uses the maximum allotted amount of memory.
trans-unit.target: 這表示快取會繼續執行直到伺服器會使用配置的記憶體數量上限。

trans-unit.source: This is the default behavior in ASP.NET 3.5 and earlier versions.
trans-unit.target: 這是在 ASP.NET 3.5 和舊版中的預設行為。

trans-unit.source: URL metadata is not cached.
trans-unit.target: URL 中繼資料不會快取。

trans-unit.source: The metadata is regenerated with every request.
trans-unit.target: 每個要求重新產生中繼資料。

trans-unit.source: This is more efficient for scenarios where the same URL is rarely requested.
trans-unit.target: 這是針對案例很少要求相同的 URL 時更有效率。
